recipe.title: Vegetarian Black Bean And Sweet Potato Tacos Recipe by Tasty

ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup ; sweet potato, diced ; (40 g)
¼ cup ; black beans, 1 can, drained and rinsed ; (40 g)
¼ cup ; pico de gallo, see recipe ; (45 g)

steps.step: Toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium microwave-safe bowl, and microwave until tender, about 2 minutes.
Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet over low heat and fill with cooked sweet potatoes, black the beans, pico de gallo, and avocado. Garnish with cilantro.

steps_updated.steps_updated: Toss the sweet potatoes with the olive oil, salt, and pepper in a medium microwave-safe bowl, and microwave until tender, about 2 minutes.
Heat the tortillas in a dry skillet over low heat and fill with cooked sweet potatoes, black the beans, pico de gallo, and avocado.
